definitions.definition: A substance that is applied as a liquid or paste, and dries into a solid coating that protects or adds color/colour to an object or surface to which it has been applied.
(in the plural) A set of containers or blocks of paint of different colors/colours, used for painting pictures.
The free-throw lane, construed with the.
definitions.example: The Nimrods are strong on the outside, but not very good in the paint.
I am running low on paint for my marker.

definitions.definition: A face card (king, queen, or jack).
Graphics drawn using an input device, not scanned or generated.
Any substance fixed with latex to harden it.
To apply in the manner that paint is applied.
To cover (something) with spots of colour, like paint.

definitions.example: to paint a portrait or a landscape

definitions.definition: To practise the art of painting pictures.
definitions.example: I've been painting since I was a young child.

definitions.definition: To draw an element in a graphical user interface.

definitions.example: She sued the author of the biography, claiming it painted her as a duplicitous fraud.

definitions.definition: To color one's face by way of beautifying it.
To direct a radar beam toward.
definitions.example: "We'll paint the target for the flyboys," the JTAC said.
